amendment.description: Amendment protects access to emergency room care and reduces health care costs by extending liability coverage to on-call and emergency room physicians under the Public Health Service Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-416 to address the crisis in access to emergency care by extending liability coverage to on-call and emergency room physicians under the Public Health Service Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
